original: Atthi dvinnaṁ nibbānānaṁ uccanīcatā hīnapaṇītatā ukkaṁsāvakaṁso sīmā vā bhedo vā rāji vā antarikā vāti?
analyzed: atthi dvinnam nibbānānam ucca nīca tā hīna paṇīta tā ukkasa avakasaḥ sīmā vā bhedaḥ vā rāji vā antarikā vā ati
nanu ap paṭisaṅkhā niruddhe saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhāḥ nirodhenti iti

original: Hañci appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhe saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhā nirodhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci appaṭisaṅkhā niruddhe saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhāḥ nirodhenti no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, paṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggāti?
analyzed: nanu ap paṭisaṅkhā niruddhāḥ api saṅkhārāḥ accanta bhaggā paṭisaṅkhā niruddhāḥ api saṅkhārāḥ accanta bhaggā ti

original: Hañci appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, paṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci ap paṭisaṅkhā niruddhā api saṅkhārāḥ accanta bhaggā paṭisaṅkhā niruddhā api saṅkhārāḥ accanta bhaggā tena vata re vattabbe
paṭisaṅkhā niruddhā api saṅkhārāḥ ariya maggam āgamma niruddhā ati
a paṭisaṅkhā niruddhā saṅkhārāḥ ariya maggam āgamma niruddhā ati
paṭisaṅkhā niruddhā saṅkhārāḥ na punar uppajjanti iti
appaṭisaṅkhā niruddhā saṅkhārāḥ na punar uppajjanti iti
